Discount Rates We estimate the service and interest cost components of the net periodic benefit expense for our United States and most of our international defined benefit pension, other postretirement benefit, and postemployment benefit plans utilizing a full yield curve approach by applying the specific spot rates along the yield curve used to determine the benefit obligation to the re
rial net gains of $189 million on our postretirement and postemployment benefit plans, mainly as the result of liability increases from lower historical interest rates.
